skills.name: USURPER
desc: • Deals one hit of physical, magic, and true damage to all enemies.
• 20% Chance to Transform all Golden Effects, except Perfect Health, Shroud, and Soul Protect, into Silver Effects.
• 50% Chance to grant Perfect Hit status to each ally for 2 turns.

skills.name: GRAND DECEPTION
desc: • Grant Trap status to all allies for 3 turns.
• 50% Chance to grant Shroud to each ally for 3 turns.
• Instantly grant an Extra Turn to self and a random ally.

skills.name: BLOCK
desc: Takes the damage for any ally below 50% HP or any attack that would reduce an ally below 50% HP.
